it.polimi.automata.transition

Interface Transition<LABEL extends Label>

  • Type Parameters:
    LABEL - is the label of the transition which must extend the interface Label. Depending on whether the transition is associated with the model or a property it is associated with a set of atomic propositions or a propositional logic formula, respectively.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    TransitionImpl

    public interface Transition<LABEL extends Label>

    Represents a transition of an automaton.
    A transition is identified by an id and is labeled by characters

    Author:
    claudiomenghi
    See Also:
    TransitionImpl

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getId()
      returns the id of the transition
      java.util.Set<LABEL> getLabels()
      returns the label associated with the transition.

    • Method Detail

      • getId

        int getId()

        returns the id of the transition

        Returns:
        the id of the transition

      • getLabels

        java.util.Set<LABEL> getLabels()

        returns the label associated with the transition. Depending on whether the transition is associated with the model or a property it is associated with a set of labels or a propositional logic formula, respectively. The semantic of the different labels is that the transition can be performed if one of the labels (conditions) is satisfied

        Returns:
        the label associated with the transition
